name: Lillian Yang
headerTaglineFour: who loves coding and   team collaboration

projects.title: GPT-3 React Landing Page
projects.description: A modern, responsive landing page built with React, inspired by GPT-3 and OpenAI. Features advanced component structure, modular CSS, and a clean, professional UI for SaaS, AI, or tech startups.

projects.title: React App Weather
projects.description: A simple weather application built with React. Users can search for the current weather in any city using the OpenWeatherMap API. Displays temperature, weather description, and weather icon in a responsive interface.

projects.title: Posts App
projects.description: Firebase Posts App is a full-stack web application that allows users to create, read, update, and delete posts. It uses Firebase for backend services.

projects.title: Connect 4 Game
projects.description: A web-based implementation of the classic Connect 4 game. Two players take turns dropping discs into a grid, aiming to connect four in a row. Built with React and modern web technologies.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building fast and scalable web applications.

services.title: Application Development
services.description: Custom application development tailored to your business needs.

services.title: Desktop App Development
services.description: Cross-platform desktop application development for Windows, macOS, and Linux.
